name: pja-stick-3d-studio
description: Production-ready e-commerce platform for PJA Stick & 3D Studio

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=frontend && npm run lint:fix --workspace=backend
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && gcloud run deploy pja3d-backend --source . --region us-central1

author: PJA Stick & 3D Studio
